name: bitesize-cursai-plugin
description: Custom WordPress plugin for Bitesize Irish Cúrsaí membership site

scripts.build: npm run version:bump && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: echo 'No CSS to build yet' || true
scripts.build:js: echo 'No JS to build yet' || true
scripts.build:dev: npm run lint:php && npm run build:css:dev && npm run build:js:dev
scripts.build:css:dev: echo 'No CSS to build yet' || true
scripts.build:js:dev: echo 'No JS to build yet' || true
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.watch:css: echo 'No CSS to watch yet' || true
scripts.watch:js: echo 'No JS to watch yet' || true
scripts.lint:php:fix: echo 'PHP syntax errors must be fixed manually. Check the files listed above.'
scripts.pre-deploy: npm run lint:php && npm run build
scripts.version: npm run pre-deploy && npm run version:bump

author: Bitesize Irish
